definition: vertical shaft (for mining, ventilation systems etc)
Jing, one of the 28 constellations of Chinese astronomy/surname Jing

sentences.english: The temporary concrete lining guard wall method was used in excavating vertical shaft.
sentences.chinese: 竖井开挖采用了临时混凝士衬砌护壁措施。

sentences.english: The mine shaft sinking with a mine shaft drilling is a reliable mine shaft construction method to pass through a deep and thick alluvium.
sentences.chinese: 钻井法凿井是通过深厚冲积层最可靠的竖井施工方法。

sentences.english: The powerhouse is designed to be of shaft and semi-underground type and the substation of open type.
sentences.chinese: 厂房采用竖井半地下式布置，开敞式变电站。

sentences.english: These silos and isolation are the things that the SOA solutions struggle against.
sentences.chinese: 这些竖井和孤立就是SOA解决方案要斗争的对象。

sentences.english: There will be many problems in the design and construction of vertical shaft when it passes through the worked-out mine area.
sentences.chinese: 设计与建设穿越废矿区的竖井时会遇到许多问题。

sentences.english: The Changjiang rub-river tunnel is designed as inverted siphon with drop shaft.
sentences.chinese: 长江过江隧道采用了竖井式倒虹吸管的布置形式。

sentences.english: The circular tube belt conveyor is a new method for hoisting coal in a vertical shaft.
sentences.chinese: 圆管胶带输送机是竖井提升煤炭的一种新方法。

sentences.english: Fixed the track in the shaft side to prevent the sedan theater box rocking.
sentences.chinese: 在竖井的侧面固定了轨道以防止轿厢的晃动。

sentences.english: Our goal is to transcend silos.
sentences.chinese: 我们的目标是超越竖井。

sentences.english: Jack directed his light down into the shaft and asked Karen and Gnea to do the same.
sentences.chinese: 杰克将光束打入竖井，也请凯伦和妮雅照办。

sentences.english: His voice rose from the shaft like that of an oracle.
sentences.chinese: 他的声音从竖井下升起，如同天启神喻。
系统是在竖井中构建的。

sentences.english: In Yangzhuoyong Lake Hydropower Station, the Surge shaft, a differential structure, is composed of vertical shaft and upper chamber.
sentences.chinese: 羊湖电站调压井为差动式结构，由竖井和上室组成。

sentences.english: The calculations are divided into two cases-closed shaft and open shaft.
sentences.chinese: 计算分为竖井封闭及竖井开启两种情况。

sentences.english: The calculations are divided into two cases-closed shaft and open shaft.
sentences.chinese: 计算分为竖井封闭及竖井开启两种情况。

sentences.english: Those single-domain applications are said to be "siloed."
sentences.chinese: 这些单一域应用程序也称为“竖井”应用程序。

definition: to dig out/to excavate/to scoop out
Dongkou county in Shaoyang 邵陽|邵阳[Shao4 yang2], Hunan
variant of 岩層|岩层[yan2 ceng2]/rock strata
